projects.name: E-Commerce-Server
projects.description: Utilizing sequelize, express, mysql2 to create a database that can get, add, update, and delete data through API platform like Postman and Insomnia.

projects.name: GaitSpeed
projects.description: GaitSpeed is a mobile application that measure the movement speed of elderly, record them, and display them on the application, also showing how their speed is correlated to their current health status.

projects.name: Gardenista
projects.description: Gardenista is a web application that allows verfied users to track their garden plants, schedule watering days, view weather in their location, and write web journal entries.

projects.name: Note-Taker
projects.description: Note-Taker is a web application that allow user to record their note and save them to look back at later.

projects.name: Pokedex
projects.description: Pokedex is a web application that the user can freely search for a pokemon and see its stats and skills.

projects.name: README Generator
projects.description: Through the terminal, the user can enter information being asked, then the software will generate a README.md with all the information enter.
